thread.section_title: Cash4Books.net Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Cash4Books.net | www.cash4books.net
thread.title: Heather

author: Heather
title: Heather
text: I'm very happy I found Cash4Books! I looked up numerous book sites to sell back my books and could not find any that gave me a good deal. Cash4Books is very easy to use, super quick and no fees or catches. I have bought a number of textbooks for college and I have never used them or will never use them again. I would definitely use them again and have already referred them to friends!
